滀字的基本解释

滀
chù
积聚：“镜湖滀众水。”
郁结：“夫忿滀之气，散而不反。”
湍急：“滀水高陵。”

滀
xù
〔滀仕〕越南地名。

滀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chù］
［《廣韻》丑六切，入屋，徹。］
(1)水积聚。
(2)郁结。
(3)湍急。参见“滀水”。
(4)勃然变色貌。

滀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滀； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页641第21
【廣韻】丑六切【集韻】敕六切，?音蓄。水聚也。【木華·海賦】?濆淪而滀漯。【註】滀漯，攢聚貌。　又【莊子·大宗師】滀乎進我色也。【註】色憤起貌。　又急意。【後漢·公孫瓚傳】滀水陵高。【註】滀喩急也。

滀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Depressed
chù
Accumulation: "Jinghu Lake is full of water."
Stagnation: "The husband's anger, dissipate but not turn back."
Rushing: "The river is high and the tomb is high."
Depressed
xù
〔Jang Shi〕 Vietnamese place names.
Depressed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chù］
["Guangyun" ugly six cuts, enter the house, thoroughly. ]
(1) Water accumulation.
(2) Stagnation.
(3) Rush. See "Jianshui".
(4) The appearance is changed suddenly.
Depressed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　滀; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 641 21
【Guang Yun】Ugly six cuts 【Ji Yun】Eight six cuts, sound storage. Water gathering also. 【Muhua·Haifu】? Depressed and depressed. 【Note】Yangluo, gather together appearance.　[Zhuangzi·Grand Master] I almost enter my lust. [Note] Look angry and look up.　Anxious again. 【The Legend of Later Han·Gongsun Zan】Jun Shui Ling is high. [Note] Anxious too.
